text: James Franco has been accused of sexual misconduct by five women, including former students at the actor - director ’ s New York acting school. The allegations, which have been reported by the Los Angeles Times, include claims that Franco engaged in inappropriate or sexually exploitative behaviour by the women, four of whom were coached by him at his film and acting school, Studio 4.
